title: Trickery Domain
content:
mons a wall of razor-sharp blades that turns the area into Difficult Terrain and damages anyone foolish enough to come close.

18m DEX SaveConcentration

Raise a corpse as a heinous mummy that fights by your sde.

The target must be a Medium or Small corpse.

Reduce a target's maximum hit points, but never below 1.

On Save: Targets still take half damage

Heal a target's wounds and remove Blindness and any diseases.

No effect on undead and constructs.

You and everyone around can't be poisoned
